citations.narrative:
3.125 (a) Structural Strength. The hanging pouch inside the enclosure housing 2 adult sugar gliders has several
holes with fraying edges. The holes are large enough that the animals could potentially get caught/tangle in and
cause injuries. Maintain housing facilities so that they are structurally sound, in good repair and protect the animals
from injuries.
To be corrected by: Corrected during time of inspection
Inspection accompanied by ACI Mary Bartels, ACI Cindy Rhodes and a facility representative. An exit briefing was
conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors
Bartels Mary, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
3.125 (a) Structural Strength.  The hanging pouch inside the enclosure housing 2 adult sugar gliders has several
holes with fraying edges.  The holes are large enough that the animals could potentially get caught/tangle in and
cause injuries.  Maintain housing facilities so that they are structurally sound, in good repair and protect the animals
from injuries.
To be corrected by:  Corrected during time of inspection
Inspection accompanied by ACI Mary Bartels, ACI Cindy Rhodes and a facility representative.  An exit briefing was
conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors
Bartels Mary, Animal Care Inspector
